unnormalised: Yeah, Mr. Sharma, the Sr. VP of Ops, said the Q3 results are gonna be lit! Let's see if Ms. Kapoor, the CFO, will finally approve our Diwali bonus this year!
normalised: Yeah, Mister Sharma, the Senior Vice President of Operations, said the third quarter results are gonna be lit! Let's see if Missus Kapoor, the Chief Financial Officer, will finally approve our Diwali bonus this year!
